org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.aggregation.functions.containment

Class HasVertexLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.aggregation.functions.BaseAggregateFunction
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.aggregation.functions.containment.HasLabel
        • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.aggregation.functions.containment.HasVertexLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FilterFunction<GraphHead>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, AggregateFunction, VertexAggregateFunction, CombinableFilter<GraphHead>, Or

    public class HasVertexLabel
extends HasLabel
implements VertexAggregateFunction
    Aggregate and filter function to check presence of a vertex label in a graph.

    Usage:

    1. aggregate
    2. filter using the same UDF instance.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
